Send OTP to the provided phone number for authentication

Get paginated list of drivers with filtering

Get fuel alert details by ID

Get location history for a vehicle

Publish emergency or important alerts to entire fleet
Send broadcast message to all drivers and admins via MQTT

Publish real-time vehicle location to MQTT for mobile apps
